actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation, H. Rept. 94-1697.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A bill to provide that the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the Jones Bluff Lock and Dam on the Alabama River, Ala., shall hereafter be known as the R. E. Bob Woodruff Reservoir.

summary.text: Stipulates that the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the "Jones Bluff Lock and Dam" on the Alabama River, Alabama, shall hereafter be known as the R.E. "Bob" Woodruff Reservoir.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the Jones Bluff Lock and Dam on the Alabama River, Ala., shall hereafter be known as the R. E. Bob Woodruff Reservoir.
